did.abstract: This collection contains deeds, bonds, mortgages, maps, letter books, and other legal documents pertaining to residents of Brooklyn and Queens, N.Y. generated by the C. and T. Perry law firm. The firm was located in Greenpoint, Brooklyn, where the majority of its clients lived.
